NTGAZ.IS.summary: Naturelgaz Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S. engages in the supply of natural gas through CNG and LNG pipelines. It also provides LNG system installation and LNG supply services. The company was founded in 2004 and is based in Beyoglu, Turkey. Naturelgaz Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S. is a subsidiary of Global Yatirim Holding A.S.
